All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
addAppointmentController
addAppointment Controller creates new appointments and appends them to the appointment table in the GUI.
addCustomerController
add customer controller creates a new customer and adds it to the table in the GUI.
Appointments
Appointments is a class that is usedd to create new appointments.
appointmentsController
appointments controller is the hub for all appointments.
contactScheduleController
the contact schedule controller gives the user access to the contacts schedule.
customerController
The customer controller gives user access to the Customer table.
Customers
the Customers class is used to create new customers to add to the list in the Schedule class which is then used to populate the customers table
Division
there are 3 countries with seperate divisions-- states, regions and provinces.
JDBC
 
loginController
Here the user will attempt to login.
Main
 
month
the month class was created to view the total of appointments by month and populate a GUI table.
Schedule
Schedule is the hub of all Lists and Methods used to make this program work.
total
total class was created to get the type and count of each type and present it into a GUI.
totalController
total controller populates the two tables with totals for month and type
updateAppointmentController
gets the selected appoint from table and allows the user to update everything except for appointment ID.
updateCustomerController
Update customer controller is used to select a customer from the customer table and append the information
